cab.content: Mili^ar^ Secret. 651mo miri From Viceroy, Army Department, 11th July 1917. : (Received 5 p.m.) 10254. MaKsud operations. Jirga has accepted Government terras asseparately, reported. Force will move to camp in the neighbourhood ofTuran (Jhina till after the Id when final settlement will be made. Health ofBritish troops fair, Indian troops good.
